text: Wutong () is a subdistrict and the seat of Lengshuitan District in Yongzhou Prefecture-level City, Hunan, China. The subdistrict is located in the middle southwest portion of Lengshuitan District and was formed in January 2003, it has an area of with a population of 43,699 (as of 2010 censusthe population of 2010 census in Wutong Subdistrict, according to the History of Lengshuitan District - 冷水滩区历史沿革, see xzqh.org (2016-01-11)). In 2015, the subdistrict was divided into 3 communities, its seat is at Wutong Community ().Introduction of Wutong Subdistrict - 梧桐街道办事处简介: see Lengshuitan.gov.cn (2015-9-14), also see lstnews.cn ==References== ==External links== *Official website of Wutong Subdistrict (Chinese / 中文) Category:Lengshuitan Category:Township-level divisions of Hunan
title: Wutong, Yongzhou
